abstract: Anheuser-Busch Companies said profit would rise on higher sales of imported beers and fewer discounts of Bud Light and Michelob.
snippet: Anheuser-Busch Companies said profit would rise on higher sales of imported beers and fewer discounts of Bud Light and Michelob.
lead_paragraph: The Anheuser-Busch Companies said yesterday that profit would rise more than forecast this year on higher sales of imported beers and fewer discounts of Bud Light and Michelob.

headline.main: Helped by Imports, Busch Raises Forecast
headline.print_headline: Helped by Imports, Busch Raises Forecast
